languages.text: "Значит, комендант или палач? Что ж, осталось выбрать!"

traits.locale_text: "Что за чертовщина произошла во время казни — после чего все пошло в варп?"

languages.text: "So, it is either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."
languages.original_text: "Значит, комендант или палач? Что ж, осталось выбрать!"

traits.locale_text: "Either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."
"So, it is either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."
"What in the void happened during the execution?"
"So, it is either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."
"So, it is either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."
"Either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."
"So, it is either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."

languages.text: “也就是说，要么处罚刽子手，要么处罚指挥官是吗？很好，我要宣布判决了。”
languages.original_text: "So, it is either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，要么处罚刽子手，要么处罚指挥官是吗？很好，我要宣布判决了。”

languages.text: «Entonces la cosa está entre el comandante o el verdugo, ¿no? En ese caso, tomaré una decisión».
languages.original_text: "So, it is either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces la cosa está entre el comandante o el verdugo, ¿no? En ese caso, tomaré una decisión».

languages.text: "Suçlumuz ya komutan ya da cellat, öyle mi? Şimdi kararımı vereceğim."
languages.original_text: "So, it is either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."

traits.locale_text: "Suçlumuz ya komutan ya da cellat, öyle mi? Şimdi kararımı vereceğim."

languages.text: 「では、司令官か、処刑人のどちらかということか？では、{mf|俺|私}が決断を下そう」
languages.original_text: "So, it is either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."

traits.locale_text: 「では、司令官か、処刑人のどちらかということか？では、{mf|俺|私}が決断を下そう」

languages.text: « Alors, c'est soit le commandant, soit le bourreau ? Dans ce cas, je vais prendre ma décision. »
languages.original_text: "So, it is either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, c'est soit le commandant, soit le bourreau ? Dans ce cas, je vais prendre ma décision. »

languages.text: "Also entweder der Kommandant oder der Henker, ja? Dann treffe ich nun meine Entscheidung."
languages.original_text: "So, it is either the commander or the executioner, is it? Then I shall now make my decision."

traits.locale_text: "Also entweder der Kommandant oder der Henker, ja? Dann treffe ich nun meine Entscheidung."
